title: Justice Department Sues Texas Over Its New Voting Law
sub_head: The GOP-led state enacted a law tightening voting rules; Democrats say the law aims to suppress voters
body:
The Justice Department sued Texas over its new voting law, the latest of the Biden administrationâ€™s challenges to Republican-backed efforts in some states to change voting procedures.
Write to Sadie Gurman at sadie.gurman@wsj.com
